You can swim in water.\n<font color="#909090">Press the directional keys to move while swimming. Holding the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">basic attack</font> <font color="#909090">key allows you to swim even faster. Swimming faster consumes</font> <font color="#00a2ed">stamina</font><font color="#909090"> however, so be careful.</font>

This is the tutorial section that explains the basic control methods.\nPress <font color='#00A2ED'>[Space]</font><font color="#909090"> to skip the tutorial dialogue.</font>\n<font color="#909090">For this window,</font> press <font color='#00A2ED'>[Esc]</font><font color="#909090"> to close it.</font>

Collect spilled honey by pressing the [[keyAction:get]] key
Quest in progress

Click the quest guide to see more details.</font>\nYou can use <font color='#00A2ED'>shortcut key [L]</font><font color="#909090"> or the </font><font color="#00a2ed">quest menu</font><font color="#909090"> at the bottom right.</font>

Well then, shall we head over to the Windy Forest Trail?

There is something you should know before you begin to fight monsters.
This is your health.
Your health decreases when you are attacked.
My Current Health
When your health reaches 0, you'll end up stuck under a tombstone and unable to move. Be careful.
Make sure your health does not fall to 0!
Watch your health and hunt for forest trail mushrooms.

[[icon:questcomplete]] Speak to Venus
Congratulations, you leveled up!
You level up when you gather enough experience.
You can earn experience by hunting monsters or helping friends.
When you level up, your attributes increase and you can learn new skills.
Speaking of new skills, it seems that you have one in your quickslots.
Try pressing the [[keyAction:actionSlot6]] key to use the Power Strike skill.
Power Strike
Press the [[keyAction:actionSlot6]] key to use the Power Strike skill.
Nice! You can now handle stronger monsters.
Your spirit is low. Using this skill a few times can drain your spirit quickly.
Whenever you use this type of skill, it uses spirit.
Spirit\nNeeded to use powerful skills.
If you don't have enough spirit, you cannot use the skill.
Spirit is recovered on its own, but using a spirit recovery skill will speed up the process.
Use the Hammer Blow skill from your quickslots.
Use Hammer Blow
Press the [[keyAction:actionSlot5]] key to use the Hammer Blow skill.
Your spirit isn't recovering right now, but it will once you start battling monsters again.
Pay attention to your spirit during battle if you want to keep enemies down.
Venus has more to say.
Do you feel like listening to her story?
[[icon:questaccept]] Talk to Venus
Use your new skills to hunt forest trail pigs.
[[Icon:questprogress]] Hunt forest trail pigs as Venus requested
[[Icon:questcomplete]] Return to Venus
[[icon:portal]] Travel to Amherst
You've arrived at Amherst.
Search for Grandpa Santiago.
I'll get going now. Even more exciting adventures await you!
Press the button to revive

You got a trophy.\n<font color="#909090">While adventuring in Maple World, you'll earn all kinds of </font><font color="#00a2ed">trophies</font><font color="#909090"> for your deeds. Some trophies also grant</font> <font color="#00a2ed">rewards</font><font color="#909090"> when you earn them, so check the reward tab in your trophy window regularly.</font>
Open your trophy window and find your reward.
Click the reward tab
Open your inventory window and configure auto-looting.
Item Auto-loot Settings

You're stuck under a tombstone.\n<font color="#909090">If you press the <font color="#00a2ed">Revive in a Safe Place</font> button, you will </font><font color="#00a2ed">revive in a safe area</font><font color="#909090">. If another player hits the tombstone enough to deplete its health bar, you will</font> <font color="#00a2ed">revive on the spot</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

You were freed from a tombstone.\n<font color="#909090">You were revived, but you will be <font color="#00a2ed">weakened for 1 hour</font>. You can restore your strength immediately by visiting a doctor. If your health reaches 0 while weakened, you will be pinned by an <font color="#00a2ed">unbreakable tombstone</font>.</font>
You fell from a high place.\n<font color="#909090">You cannot become tombstoned by falling, but you will take fall damage. Please watch your step!</font>

You're stuck under a metal tombstone.\n<font color="#909090">You got out from under that first tombstone, but since you lost all your health while weakened, you got stuck under a </font><font color="#00a2ed">metal tombstone</font><font color="#909090">. Metal tombstones cannot be knocked over by other players, so you'll have to use the </font> <font color="#00a2ed">Revive button</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

Beginners can advance to a new job.\nVisit the job instructors at <font color="#00a2ed">Tria's</font><font color="#909090"></font> <font color="#00a2ed">Grand Hall</font><font color="#909090">, listen to their explanations, and then select a</font> <font color="#00a2ed">job</font><font color="#909090">. Once you select a job, you can use</font> <font color="#00a2ed">job-exclusive equipment and skills</font><font color="#909090"> to become even stronger.</font>

Work together and fight!\n<font color="#909090">In Maple World, there are</font> <font color="#00a2ed">strong monsters</font><font color="#909090"> that are too tough to face alone. You'll need to team up with others to defeat these mighty foes.</font> <font color="#00a2ed">You can fight together even without forming a party, and everyone will still get rewards.</font>
Open the World Map

Check the world map.\n<font color="#909090">In the <font color="#00a2ed">world map</font> window, you can see which maps have quests, events, bosses, taxi stops, and so on at a glance. If you lose your way while traveling to your destination, always check your world map.</font>

There's a map with an event open.\n<font color="#909090">Once in a while in Maple World,</font> <font color="#00a2ed">special events</font><font color="#909090"> are held. These events can be found on the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">world map</font><font color="#909090">. Clicking the event icon</font> will allow you to <font color="#00a2ed">travel there for free</font><font color="#909090">.</font>
View Maple World

Where is everyone hanging out right now?\n<font color="#00a2ed">Checking hot spots on the world map</font><font color="#909090"> will show you specific maps and channels that are popular at the moment.</font>
View Hot Spots
View Quest Areas
View Shadow World
Climb the wall to move.\n<font color="#909090">Jump at a wall and hold forward to climb it. To stop climbing, jump away from the wall.</font>
Wall Climbing
Open your skill window and equip the Wall Climbing skill.

You've got a job!\n<font color="#909090">That's right. A job. A profession. A unique set of skills. And, while you can run around wielding the wrong weapons if you like, you're really better off using the right weapons for your job. After all, without the right weapons, you won't even be able to use most of your abilities!</font>
Equip a job-specific skill and use it.

You have discovered a taxi stop.\n<font color="#909090">All over Maple World, you'll find</font> <font color="#00a2ed">taxi stops</font><font color="#909090"> in convenient locations. You can call a taxi from a discovered taxi stop and</font> <font color="#00a2ed">travel to another discovered taxi stop</font><font color="#909090">. Don't forget that there's a </font><font color="#00a2ed">taxi fare</font><font color="#909090"> to pay, too.</font>

Please select a taxi stop.\n<font color="#909090">Select the taxi stop</font> <font color="#00a2ed">that you'd like to travel to</font><font color="#909090">. You will only be able to travel to an already discovered taxi stop. The farther away it is, the more the taxi fare will be.</font>
Open the inventory window and check your Emote
Click the Misc tab
Double-click to learn the Emote
Open the Emote window
Double-click with the mouse\nor configure the shortcut keys and use
Double-tap the left stick to learn the emote
Double-tap the left stick or set a shortcut key to use

Zoom in and out with the camera.\n<font color="#00a2ed">Use the mouse wheel</font><font color="#909090"> to </font><font color="#00a2ed">zoom in</font><font color="#909090"> and</font> <font color="#00a2ed">out</font><font color="#909090"> with your camera. Use the zoom feature to examine yourself better or when you want to view the faraway skies.</font>
Open your inventory window and check your mount
Double-click to summon or desummon your mount
Click the Mount tab
Double-tap the left stick to summon or unsummon your mount

Track Your Damage\n<font color="#909090">The damage meter begins tracking all <font color="#00a2ed">damage you deal to enemies</font> from the moment it is activated. You can reset the active session at any time by pressing the reset button at the top of the damage meter window.</font>
Mouse over and check the menu

Spectate another party member.\n<font color="#909090">While tombstoned,</font> <font color="#00a2ed">you can watch your party members from their own perspective</font><font color="#909090">. Click the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">camera button</font><font color="#909090"> on the party UI.</font>
Click the camera and spectate

You can store items and mesos here.\n<font color="#909090">Drag or right-click an item to move it to storage. You can use the deposit button to store mesos, too. Stored items and mesos can be moved to</font> <font color="#00a2ed">the inventory of other characters on the same account.</font>

Dismantling is easy!\n<font color="#909090">Onyx Crystals, <font color="#00a2ed">used as catalyst for enchanting weapons or armor</font>, can be obtained by dismantling Lv. 20+ equipment. The number of Onyx Crystals that will be extracted depends on the dismantled item's level and sales price.</font>

You can replace the items displayed in the shop.\n<font color="#909090">If there aren't any items you like in the shop or you don't want to wait for the next shipment,</font> <font color="#00a2ed">press the Instant Restock button.</font> <font color="#909090">Just remember, this service costs a small fee.</font>
Instantly refresh the sales list

You can sell or purchase items on the Black Market.\n<font color="#909090">All trades conducted on the Black Market are carried out in secret. The identity of the seller and buyer are confidential, and you can find mesos and powerful items for sale.</font>

If you break the rules, Belma will punish you.\n<font color="#909090">Disrupting other players can lead you to be imprisoned and unable to </font> <font color="#00a2ed">chat, make UGC, and use other features</font><font color="#909090">. </font> <font color="#00a2ed">Reflect upon your actions</font><font color="#909090"> to shorten your sentence.</font>

You must be aware of your surroundings while in the Shadow World.\n<font color="#909090">The Shadow World is dominated by the evil Turka, who has divided his realm into regular and hostile zones.</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Without the Lapenta Aegis, you may fall victim to those in the hostile zones,</font><font color="#909090">so be ever vigilant.</font>
You are enshrouded in dark power.\n<font color="#909090">Your health has been dramatically increased, but allies have become foes. Note that your health can be further boosted with elixirs.</font>

You must be aware of your surroundings in $map:03000059$.\n<font color="#909090">The Shadow World is divided into regular and hostile zones. $map:03000059$</font> <font color="#00a2ed">is an area where players can attack each other</font><font color="#909090">, so be on your guard at all times.</font>

There is an arena atop Brave Peak.
<font color="#909090">For generations, when there was conflict among the people of Perion, the doors to the arena opened to them.
Now it opens for warriors who want to</font> <font color="#00a2ed">complete with others for glory</font><font color="#909090">.
Join the arena and show off your skills that you have worked hard to develop.</font>

You've entered a Pocket Realm.\n<font color="#909090">The entrances to the Pocket Realm exist everywhere, and you can explore all sorts of maps within. There are mesos and surprise gifts to find as well, so if you discover a hat that glows blue, don't ignore it!</font>

Explore the Quest Journal.\n<font color="#909090"><font color="#00a2ed">Epic quests</font> are related to the main story. <font color="#00a2ed">World quests</font> are independent adventures that can be found across the world.</font>

Add a title to your character's name.\n<font color="#909090">Titles</font> <font color="#00a2ed">can be earned from trophy rewards</font><font color="#909090">. Your collected titles can be viewed and selected in the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">character info window</font><font color="#909090">. Get as many trophies and titles as you can so you can find the one that fits your character.</font>
Open the character info window and check your titles
Select a title
Get rewards just for playing the game!\n<font color="#909090">When you log into the game, you'll get an event reward once a day per account.</font>

You've arrived at Victoria Island.\n<font color="#909090">The Empress will be holding court in</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Tria</font><font color="#909090">. You should head there first.</font> When you reach<font color="#00a2ed">Level 10</font><font color="#909090">, you can enter</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Tria's Grand Hall</font><font color="#909090"> and choose a job from Knight, Berserker, Wizard, Priest, Archer, Heavy Gunner, Thief, or Assassin.</font>

Get your name on a banner.\n<font color="#909090">If you earn lots of trophies or score big in Maple Arena, you can get your portrait on the corresponding banner. Rankings are updated once a day.</font>

Dungeons have entry requirements.\n<font color="#909090">To enter a dungeon, you must meet the</font> <font color="#909090"><font color="#00a2ed">level, gear score, and trophy requirements</font>. Your gear score is the combined scores of the gear you currently have equipped.</font>

Participate in the guild championship with your guildmates.\nIf there are <font color="#00a2ed">3 guild members at Lv. 50 or above</font><font color="#909090"> logged in, you can join. You'll be admitted to the arena once your match is ready. Other guild members</font> <font color="#00a2ed">can also come to show their support</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

Check the guild battle score.\n<font color="#909090">You can check the scores for the current and previous season. In the current score tab, press the (+) button to view the last 10 battle results. The previous score tab can be checked only if there are records of previous guild battle participation.</font>

Purchase special items with treva.\nBuying special items from the <font color="#00a2ed">Shadow Merchant</font> in the <font color="#909090">Land of Darkness</font> <font color="#909090">requires</font> <font color="#00a2ed">treva</font><font color="#909090">. Find treva when hunting the monsters of the Land of Darkness</font> or by exploring the <font color="#00a2ed">Twisted Pocket Realm</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

You've discovered a treasure chest.\n<font color="#909090">Treasure chests are hidden all over Maple World. <font color="#00a2ed">Golden treasure chests</font> hold rare equipment and are a popular goal for treasure hunters.</font>

Use structures that you can pick up.\n<font color="#909090">All over Maple World,</font> <font color="#00a2ed">you'll find structures that you can pick up</font><font color="#909090">. Get near a structure and press the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Space Key</font><font color="#909090"> to pick it up. Throw it by pressing the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Space or X Key</font><font color="#909090">. Throwing will trigger special effects based on the structure.</font>

Look for exclamation points and question marks on the minimap.\n<font color="#909090">Press the Tab Key to expand your minimap. Question marks represent NPCs with <font color="#00a2ed">quests that can be completed</font> while exclamation points represent <font color="#00a2ed">new quests you can accept</font>. Be on the lookout!
Gather valor tokens to purchase special items.\nOpen the Arena Shop from the Arena Menu and buy PvP supplies using your valor tokens.
Participate in the Personal Arena

Participate in the arena.\n<font color="#909090">Participate in arena</font> <font color="#00a2ed">and test your skills against other players.</font> Select the arena you <font color="#909090">want to join</font> <font color="#00a2ed">and click the Register button</font><font color="#909090">. When an opponent is found, a notification will pop up and you will be able to enter the arena right away.</font>
Participate in the Arena

Enter the arena.\n<font color="#909090">The arena is the place to test your mettle against other players. Press the </font><font color="#00a2ed">Queue</font> <font color="#909090">button to be matched up with an opponent near your skill level. Matches begin every 4 minutes. To be notified when matches between high-ranked players are available to spectate, simply check the </font><font color="#00a2ed">Spectator Notifications</font><font color="#909090"> <font color="#909090">box.</font>
Search Arena Shop
End of sale approaching!

Check the sales duration of your listed item in your shop.\n<font color="#909090">Your items listed in the Design Shop</font> <font color="#00a2ed">may be reaching the end of their sales duration</font><font color="#909090">. To put them back up after the sale ends, click the</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Relist</font> <font color="#909090">button to list it again.</font>
Real estate contract expiring soon!

Check the contract duration of your property.\n<font color="#00a2ed">There isn't much time left until your contract expires.</font> <font color="#909090">If you want to keep your property,</font> <font color="#00a2ed">press the contract extension button on your real estate contract</font> <font color="#909090">to extend the duration.</font>

Look for healing spots all over the map.\n<font color="#909090">Avoid the attacks of Maple World's monsters and</font> <font color="#00a2ed">quickly recover health</font><font color="#909090"> at healing spots. If you get into trouble during combat, look for a nearby healing spot and take a breather.</font>
Find Party

Try finding a party.\n<font color="#909090">In the Find Party window, search for parties under the specific conditions you want and send </font> <font color="#00a2ed">Party Join Requests</font><font color="#909090">. You can also form your own party and</font> <font color="#00a2ed">recruit party members</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

You picked up a spirit orb.\n<font color="#909090">Monsters drop spirit orbs that you'll automatically pick up when nearby. Picking up a spirit orb</font> <font color="#00a2ed">restores a small amount of your spirit</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

You picked up a stamina orb.\n<font color="#909090">Stamina orbs appear when you break objects or hit elite and boss monsters. Picking up a stamina orb</font> <font color="#00a2ed">restores a small amount of your stamina</font><font color="#909090">.</font>

Look for question marks on the minimap.\n<font color="#909090">Press the Tab Key to expand your minimap. Question marks represent NPCs with <font color="#00a2ed">quests that can be completed</font> while exclamation points represent <font color="#00a2ed">new quests you can accept</font>. Be on the lookout!

Catch some fish.\n<font color="#909090">When you catch fish, you build your </font><font color="#00a2ed">fishing mastery</font><font color="#909090"> and</font> <font color="#00a2ed">experience</font><font color="#909090">. At higher-level fishing holes, you must catch more fish to raise your mastery.</font>
View Fish Album

Compose new music.\n<font color="#00a2ed">Use the MapleStory 2 music code</font><font color="#909090"> to compose music. Click</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Music Guide at the top right corner</font><font color="#909090"> for instructions on how to compose.</font>
View Composition Details
Open your inventory window and check your instruments
Click the Fishing/Music tab
Double-click and open the Performance window

Play your instrument.\n<font color="#909090">There are two types of performances.</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Improvised sessions</font> <font color="#909090">are where you press the keys and perform without a score. </font><font color="#00a2ed">Score sessions</font> <font color="#909090">are where you perform using a music score. For score sessions, you must move the score from your inventory to your Instruments window.</font>
Open the inventory window and check your fishing rod
Click the Fishing/Music tab
Double-click near the water\nor equip it to your quickslot to use.
Open the inventory window and check your pet
Select the Pet tab
Double-click to summon or desummon your pet
Check Pet Info
You can view information about summoned pets.\n<font color="#909090">Pets can be </font><font color="#00a2ed">summoned by double-clicking them</font><font color="#909090"> from your inventory.</font>
You can view information about summoned pets.\n<font color="#909090">Pets can be summoned by double-clicking them from your inventory.</font>

Level up pets through fusion.\n</font><font color="#909090">To fuse, navigate to <font color="#00a2ed">Character > Pet Info > Pet Fusion</font>. Through fusion, you grant one combat pet experience by sacrificing another. When a combat pet levels up its attributes will increase, and it may unlock new talents.

View details about your summoned pet.\n<font color="#909090">Pets can be summoned by double-clicking them from your inventory. Monsters around the world can be tamed as combat pets starting at level 50.</font>

View details about your summoned pet.\n<font color="#909090">Pets can be summoned by double-clicking them from your inventory. Combat pets can be tamed starting at level 50. <font color="#00a2ed">Candy packs</font> sold by supply merchants can be used on <font color="#00a2ed">hungry monsters</font> throughout the world to render them <font color="#00a2ed">docile</font> so they can be captured using <font color="#00a2ed">snares</font>.</font>
Open the Macro Settings

Set up macros to chain skills together.\n<font color="#909090">You can use macros to configure multiple skills to a <font color="#00a2ed">single key</font>. Just hold the key to use the set skills in quick succession. Configure a macro for every occasion!</font>
Click inside the box and then press the key you want to use as a shortcut.
Open the Navigator window

Navigate Maple World.\n<font color="#909090">Search the </font><font color="#00a2ed">Maple Navigator</font> <font color="#909090">for helpful pointers on your path to becoming a hero. You can find recommended content for your level.</font>
Enjoy mini-games.\n<font color="#00a2ed">The Maple Arcade</font><font color="#909090"> has all kinds of mini-games to play. Earn rewards and see where you land in the rankings.</font>

Join a guild.\n<font color="#909090">Use the search options to find guilds based on their focus, or search for one by name. Apply to a guild you want to join to find new friends to grow and play with.</font>

You got a crystal fragment!\n<font color="#909090">Crystal fragments</font> are used for <font color="#00a2ed">skill upgrades</font><font color="#909090"></font> and can be purchased from a <font color="#00a2ed">supply merchant</font><font color="#909090">. Use crystal fragments to increase the power of your skills.</font>

Quickly travel to a map where a quest is in progress.\n<font color="#909090">When you use the portal that the NPC creates, you can quickly travel to the quest region. Portals disappear when used once or when their time runs out, but you can talk to the NPC any time to open it again so long as the quest is in progress.</font>

Virtue Runes\n<font color="#909090">You can create virtue runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Magic Guardstones</font> from Mystery Boxes and <font color="#00a2ed">Ore Scraps</font> from mining. Virtue runes can be used to strengthen equipment.</font>

Rebirth Runes\n<font color="#909090"> You can create rebirth runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Spirit Guardstones</font> from Mystery Boxes and <font color="#00a2ed">Feed Scraps</font> from tending animals. Rebirth runes reset the enchantment level of gear.</font>

Defiance Rune Guide\n<font color="#909090"> You can create defiance runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Defiance Crystals</font> from failed enchantments and <font color="#00a2ed">Ore Scraps</font> from mining. Defiance runes can be used to strengthen gear, but note that these items will become untradable.</font>

Taming Pets\n<font color="#909090">After reaching level 50, you can use <font color="#00a2ed">candy packs</font> to pacify hungry monsters and <font color="#00a2ed">snares</font> to tame them as your pet.</font>

Tame and capture hungry monsters to use them as pets.\n<font color="#909090">You can pacify a hungry monster by feeding it <font color="#00a2ed">$itemPlural:63000000$</font, which is sold by supply merchants in major cities. Once a monster becomes <font color="#00a2ed">docile</font>, use a <font color="#00a2ed">snare</font> to capture it.</font>

You've got some $itemPlural:63000000$.\n<font color="#909090">Throw them at <font color="#00a2ed">hungry monsters</font> to <font color="#00a2ed">pacify</font> them. Lead a docile monster into a <font color="#00a2ed">sbare</font> capture them as a pet.

You've earned an attribute point.\n<font color="#909090">Attribute points can be earned as rewards for </font><font color="#00a2ed">exploring areas, earning trophies, completing chapters, and so on.</font> <font color="#909090">You can use them to increase your </font><font color="#00a2ed">strength, dexterity, intelligence, luck, critical rate, and health.</font>

Explore the guild house and utilize guild services.\n<font color="#909090">As your guild level increases, you'll be able to <font color="#00a2ed">upgrade your guild house</font>, and </font><font color="#00a2ed">hire service providers.</font> <font color="#909090">Hire a guild manager to take on <font color="#00a2ed">guild quests</font><font color="#909090">, and visit guild merchants to buy all kinds of helpful items.</font>

Become a mentor.\n<font color="#909090">If you become a mentor and help out a mentee, you can get</font> <font color="#00a2ed">Mentor Points</font><font color="#909090"> and also purchase various items. Please help the mentee grow into a good friend and great peer.</font>

Assign as a returning character.\n<font color="#909090">You can enjoy various benefits by becoming a returning character. When you select a mentor, you become a </font> <font color="#00a2ed">mentee</font>. <font color="#909090">By logging in, clearing dungeons, and completing mentee missions,</font> you can get <font color="#00a2ed">Mentee Points</font> <font color="#909090">which can be used to purchase various items.</font>

You can also customize your gamepad controls and view your current control bindings.</font>

Defeat Mushking repeatedly as he grows in strength, and obtain various rewards.\n<font color="#909090">Every week from <font color="#00a2ed">Friday to Sunday</font>, Mushking arrives to plague Maple World. Adventurers from all channels can work together to defeat Mushking. However, he can only be injured by players <font color="#00a2ed">Lv.50 or higher</font> with an adequate supply of <font color="#00a2ed">Sporeblock</font>. Sporeblock can be obtained from quest, login , and playtime rewards.</font>
